data.text:
Hmm, bust, waist, and hip… with no additions! 
And no color preference written down in the remarks!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, bust, waist, and hip… with no additions! 
<story>And no color preference written down in the remarks!

data.text:
Yup, if we keep this pace up we should be able to 
finish everything by this evening! Thank goodness! 
But it's actually quite difficult to be a costume checker, huh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yup, if we keep this pace up we should be able to 
<story>finish everything by this evening! Thank goodness! 
<story>But it's actually quite difficult to be a costume checker, huh?

data.text:
The only person left is Yukippe, right? She said she'd be 
waiting for us around here, but I don't see her anywhere…
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed:
<story>The only person left is Yukippe, right? She said she'd be 
<story>waiting for us around here, but I don't see her anywhere…

data.text: Umm… I'm right here… The outfit fits well…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed: <story>Umm… I'm right here… The outfit fits well…

data.text:
Huh!? Oh it's you, Yukino-san! You look absolutely amazing! 
I thought an idol was coming to talk to us for a moment there!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Huh!? Oh it's you, Yukino-san! You look absolutely amazing! 
<story>I thought an idol was coming to talk to us for a moment there!

data.text:
No no, I don't look like an idol! But anyways, I'm really sorry 
for calling you two out all the way here. This outfit is kind of 
embarrassing and I didn't want too many people to see it…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>No no, I don't look like an idol! But anyways, I'm really sorry 
<story>for calling you two out all the way here. This outfit is kind of 
<story>embarrassing and I didn't want too many people to see it…

data.text: Huh, why not!? Yukippe, you look adorable!!
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed: <story>Huh, why not!? Yukippe, you look adorable!!

data.text:
No, no, no, no! This outfit's way too revealing! 
You can see my legs and stomach!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>No, no, no, no! This outfit's way too revealing! 
<story>You can see my legs and stomach!

data.text:
I keep checking behind me to make sure no one's looking. 
Th-Then there's the upcoming live performance…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>I keep checking behind me to make sure no one's looking. 
<story>Th-Then there's the upcoming live performance…

data.text:
Huh? Is there something bothering 
you about the live performance?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Huh? Is there something bothering 
<story>you about the live performance?

data.text:
W-Well… I heard that a lot of people from my 
hometown bought tickets to the performance!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>W-Well… I heard that a lot of people from my 
<story>hometown bought tickets to the performance!

data.text:
Geez, I'm just so nervous! 
And to add onto that, this outfit…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Geez, I'm just so nervous! 
<story>And to add onto that, this outfit…

data.text: (BOM BOM BOM BOM…!)
data.processed: <story>(BOM BOM BOM BOM…!)

data.text:
Oryaaaa! I'm not going to lose this, 
I've got the entirety of Oi pushing me forward!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Oryaaaa! I'm not going to lose this, 
<story>I've got the entirety of Oi pushing me forward!

data.text:
There's so many people that helped me along the way too! 
Tome-san, Shige-san, Chiyo-san, and Yoshi-san, I can still 
see their smiles!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>There's so many people that helped me along the way too! 
<story>Tome-san, Shige-san, Chiyo-san, and Yoshi-san, I can still 
<story>see their smiles!

data.text:
Ahaha, you and I are really similar, huh!? That means there 
ain't no way I'ma lose now! Feel the spirit of Oi!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, you and I are really similar, huh!? That means there 
<story>ain't no way I'ma lose now! Feel the spirit of Oi!

data.text: Then I'll show you the spirit of Kasamatsu!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Then I'll show you the spirit of Kasamatsu!

data.text:
Huwaaaaaahh!! 
Waaaaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Inari & Oguri
data.processed:
<story>Huwaaaaaahh!! 
<story>Waaaaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Woah! The beach sand turned into a cloud 
of dust!! Ah, I can't even see them anymore!
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed:
<story>Woah! The beach sand turned into a cloud 
<story>of dust!! Ah, I can't even see them anymore!

data.text:
The spirit of Oi and the spirit of Kasamatsu. 
I see, so those two came from the countryside too, huh?
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>The spirit of Oi and the spirit of Kasamatsu. 
<story>I see, so those two came from the countryside too, huh?

data.text: Uwaah! There's so many people and so many stalls! Tamaya!!
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed: <story>Uwaah! There's so many people and so many stalls! Tamaya!!

data.text:
Ahaha, I'm so excited! I see takoyaki, cotton candy, 
and chocolate bananas! Where should we start?♪
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, I'm so excited! I see takoyaki, cotton candy, 
<story>and chocolate bananas! Where should we start?♪

data.text:
Ahaha, I'm glad to see you girls are enjoying yourselves! 
Oh, my bad. I'm part of the preparation committee for this 
festival. Are you girls on a summer training camp?
data.name: Festival Organising Committee
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, I'm glad to see you girls are enjoying yourselves! 
<story>Oh, my bad. I'm part of the preparation committee for this 
<story>festival. Are you girls on a summer training camp?

data.text:
Yup, you're right! But we're taking a break for today. 
It's really lively here today, huh!?
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Yup, you're right! But we're taking a break for today. 
<story>It's really lively here today, huh!?

data.text:
Yeah, we've been preparing for this festival for the past year. 
But it wasn't just the preparation committee, the entire 
community came out in droves to help.
data.name: Festival Organising Committee
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, we've been preparing for this festival for the past year. 
<story>But it wasn't just the preparation committee, the entire 
<story>community came out in droves to help.

data.text:
It's amazing to see this normally quiet place come to life again. 
I hope you guys will enjoy yourself before you head back home!
data.name: Festival Organising Committee
data.processed:
<story>It's amazing to see this normally quiet place come to life again. 
<story>I hope you guys will enjoy yourself before you head back home!

data.text:
Of course we will! Hehe… this is so strange. 
Even though I've never been here, everything feels so nostalgic.
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Of course we will! Hehe… this is so strange. 
<story>Even though I've never been here, everything feels so nostalgic.

data.text:
Ah, I feel like Kochi's festivals also had a similar feeling 
to them! Everyone would dance in beautiful clothing and 
everything felt so warm.
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I feel like Kochi's festivals also had a similar feeling 
<story>to them! Everyone would dance in beautiful clothing and 
<story>everything felt so warm.

data.text:
Hokkaido was the same way! We usually have a bon odori 
festival around this time of year. The excitement and warmth 
during that festival was just like this one!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hokkaido was the same way! We usually have a bon odori 
<story>festival around this time of year. The excitement and warmth 
<story>during that festival was just like this one!

data.text:
You can really feel the love and care put into those festivals. 
They also help to reignite the fire in the community…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>You can really feel the love and care put into those festivals. 
<story>They also help to reignite the fire in the community…

data.text: That's right… Giving back to the community…
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed: <story>That's right… Giving back to the community…

data.text:
I… wish I could give back to my hometown… I hope that 
my performances and races will help to get them excited!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>I… wish I could give back to my hometown… I hope that 
<story>my performances and races will help to get them excited!

data.text:
Just like the people hosting this festival and Inari-san and 
Oguri-san, they're all carrying their hometowns on their backs!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Just like the people hosting this festival and Inari-san and 
<story>Oguri-san, they're all carrying their hometowns on their backs!

data.text:
Alright, I've made up my mind! I'm going to stop being afraid! 
In the upcoming performance I'm going to dance my heart out!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Alright, I've made up my mind! I'm going to stop being afraid! 
<story>In the upcoming performance I'm going to dance my heart out!

data.text: Woah!
data.name: Spe & Urara
data.processed: <story>Woah!

data.text:
And I'm going to enter a race near my hometown! 
I'm going to make it super exciting, win, and show 
them an amazing performance afterwards!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>And I'm going to enter a race near my hometown! 
<story>I'm going to make it super exciting, win, and show 
<story>them an amazing performance afterwards!

data.text:
That sounds like a great idea! 
I should go back home and do the same!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That sounds like a great idea! 
<story>I should go back home and do the same!

data.text: Woah, really!? Well I won't be left out on this!
data.name: Haru Urara
data.processed: <story>Woah, really!? Well I won't be left out on this!

data.text:
I'm getting so excited! I'll be in Morioka, 
Spe-san will be in Hokkaido, and Urara-san will be in Kochi!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>I'm getting so excited! I'll be in Morioka, 
<story>Spe-san will be in Hokkaido, and Urara-san will be in Kochi!

data.text:
We're all carrying the hopes and dreams of our hometowns 
on our shoulders! We'll show them an amazing race, 
an amazing victory, and an amazing performance afterwards!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>We're all carrying the hopes and dreams of our hometowns 
<story>on our shoulders! We'll show them an amazing race, 
<story>an amazing victory, and an amazing performance afterwards!

data.text: We'll repay them for all they've done for us!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed: <story>We'll repay them for all they've done for us!

data.text: I really like your spirit!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>I really like your spirit!

data.text: Inari-san and Oguri-san!?
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed: <story>Inari-san and Oguri-san!?

data.text:
But if yer really gonna do it, you better not 
give up the spotlight to anyone. If you're not 
prepared to do that, it ain't gonna be fun!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>But if yer really gonna do it, you better not 
<story>give up the spotlight to anyone. If you're not 
<story>prepared to do that, it ain't gonna be fun!

data.text:
Don't give up the spotlight to anyone…!? 
I don't think I'll be able to… 
No, no, that's the wrong mind set!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>Don't give up the spotlight to anyone…!? 
<story>I don't think I'll be able to… 
<story>No, no, that's the wrong mind set!

data.text:
I-I won't let anyone steal my spotlight! 
I'm the star of Morioka after all!
data.name: Yukino Bijin
data.processed:
<story>I-I won't let anyone steal my spotlight! 
<story>I'm the star of Morioka after all!

data.text: (fshuuu… BANG!)
data.processed: <story>(fshuuu… BANG!)

data.text:
Ahaha! Perfect timing, huh? Gotta love it. 
But Oguri, we can't let them one up us!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Perfect timing, huh? Gotta love it. 
<story>But Oguri, we can't let them one up us!

data.text:
If the next generation's gonna be so determined, 
we're gonna have to grow stronger too!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>If the next generation's gonna be so determined, 
<story>we're gonna have to grow stronger too!

data.text:
Heh, you're right… We'll need to 
show them that we're not finished yet!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Heh, you're right… We'll need to 
<story>show them that we're not finished yet!
